title: raspberry-pi-logo.png
description:
anybody got a raspberry Pi?  budgie-desktop is now in 16.10 and an ARM build is available. https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/budgie-desktop

If you have a raspberry Pi please let us know how well budgie-desktop works on a Pi.

Thanks.
comments.comment: Too heavy for RPIs (unless +Martin Wimpress​​​ et al. got the graphics driver working reliably)...﻿; Yeah we tested this a while back as a Solus experiment, and decided it wouldn't truly be viable until we went Wayland; Currently at the +Ubuntu​ Snappy Sprint and actually working on Raspberry Pi graphics stack for Unity 8, as an unexpected side project that has emerged.
